content.raw:
I completely updated my local branch \( hg update -r default -C \) and confirmed that I have the latest virtual\_stix.ign file. I also cleared the models in my `~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics` folder. However, I might be missing something since I get this message when run the new `ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign ...` command.

> Unable to find file robotConfig4:=X4\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_1

```
source ~/subt_ws/install/setup.bash
ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName3:=X3 robotConfig3:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName4:=X4 robotConfig4:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_1
```
content.html:
I completely updated my local branch ( hg update -r default -C ) and confirmed that I have the latest virtual_stix.ign file. I also cleared the models in my ~/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics folder. However, I might be missing something since I get this message when run the new ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign ... command.

Unable to find file robotConfig4:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_1

source ~/subt_ws/install/setup.bash
ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName3:=X3 robotConfig3:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName4:=X4 robotConfig4:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_1
